step.title: Transportation by road from plant to other plant

paragraph.prodType: Cell | Damaged cell | Module | Damaged module | Pack | Damaged pack
paragraph.htmltext:
The transportation process by road containes loading of a lorry, the actual travel from plant to plant and the unloading of the lorry. Note that when selecting a transport company care should be taken that the company can transport the components according to the ADR-regulations. The ADR gives next to labelling and packaging requirements, also requirements concerning loading of a lorry with dangerous goods and concerning training and qualification of the personel handling the goods.

The transportation documents, made during the preparation of the transport, shall be given to the transporter.

During transportation thermal runway is the main risk, especially for scrap, used and damaged components. If a thermal runaway starts and propagate the consequences and severity of damages to infrastructure and persons can be very high. It is therefore recommended to check the temperature on a regulare base during transport. These timely watch depends on the type of transported components and the transport duration. It is also recommended to use ventilated containers to avoid a temperature increase during transport.
